title: Cyberpunk 2077's system requirements are going up ahead of the Phantom Liberty launch, hard drive support is being dropped
description: PCs based on the original minimum spec will continue to work, but not especially well.

title: Hopes are high: Starfield rockets to second place in Steam's global bestsellers list
description: A lot of people expect Bethesda to deliver this September.

title: These Diablo 4 players are working together to find the game's secret cow level, which officially does not exist
description: Rod Fergusson said there's no secret level in Diablo 4, but some players clearly don't believe him.

title: Electronic Arts didn't cancel Titanfall 3, Respawn did—and it didn't even tell EA for six months
description: Respawn had been working on Titanfall "in earnest" for 10 months before deciding that battle royale was the future.

title: I cannot overstate how great it feels to have classic Assassin's Creed back
description: Assassin's Creed Mirage is exactly what I want from the series.

title: BattleBit Remastered, a 254-player shooter with vehicles and destructible maps, is out this week for $15
description: Time for low-poly, high-tactics shooting in early access.

title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty adds cyberware that lets you air-dash, see through walls, and 'change your appearance to lose the heat'
description: The black market at Dogtown is the place to buy new types of illegal cyberware, and it all sounds pretty useful.

title: Star Wars: Outlaws' stupid little companion is played by the go-to Star Wars voice actor
description: Okay okay, I'll Nix the cynicism.

title: This is almost certainly going to be the best year for fighting games ever
description: After playing Mortal Kombat 1 right off the back of Street Fighter 6, I think we're going to be talking about 2023 for decades.

title: New steampunk RPG criticised for 'borrowing' from Bioshock Infinite, but why is that a bad thing?
description: A producer from the trailer for Bioshock Infinite has called it 'IP-infringement levels of borrow'.

title: Dough's new glossy OLED gaming monitor aims to reduce screen 'reflections by 70%'
description: The Swiss company's flagship OLED 1440p gaming monitor is looking to make its mark against the Alienwares and Philips of the world.

title: This dark horror city builder is like being a mayor in The Witcher
description: In Gord's wonderfully grim, Slavic style, sacrificing your children to an ancient swamp horror is par for the course.

title: F1 23 review
description: Brings a far better story mode and... epic loot.

title: Capcom's weirdass dad-in-space game delayed indefinitely in the cutest manner possible
description: They're just being pragmatic about it.

title: After years of expansion and the recent collapse of a $2 billion mystery deal, Embracer Group announces major layoffs and studio closures
description: Brace yourself.

title: After Starfield, Todd Howard thinks The Elder Scrolls 6 may be his last hurrah: 'I'm not getting any younger'
description: Todd thinks he might be getting a little too elder for The Elder Scrolls 7.

title: Turns out Huawei beat Apple to trademarking 'Vision Pro' in China by 4 years
description: Will Apple change the name? I'd guess not, but it might make things tricky.

title: I didn't really get Starfield until Bethesda revealed we could just go around stealing giant space sandwiches
description: Forget charting a thousand alien worlds; I just wanna be a snack pirate.

title: New Square Enix CEO uses debut to dunk on the teachers who told him to stop playing games: 'They would be very surprised!'
description: Takashi Kiryu won hearts and minds in his first public appearance.

title: Blizzard's Diablo 4 stats suggest barely anyone is trying PvP
description: We've murdered over 276 billion creatures in PvE though. Who's the real monster?

title: The ROG Ally is available to buy from today. Good news if the Steam Deck never showed up in your area
description: This powerful PC handheld won us over, and now you can actually get one.

title: The US won't force the world's biggest chipmakers to back out of China even if it apparently makes them 'look very weak'
description: The Biden administration plans to keep trade export-control policy restrictions loose for top semiconductor manufacturers.

title: This intense, bullet time-filled FPS is a glorious tribute to FEAR and the spirit of 2000s-era gaming
description: Trepang2 isn’t subtle about its influences, but when it comes to the action it does them proud.

title: Nvidia reportedly brings the RTX 4060 launch date forward
description: Launching this month!

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #724: Tuesday, June 13
description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.

title: The world of Dragon's Dogma 2 is 'roughly 4 times' bigger than the first game's
description: Game director Hideaki Itsuno spoke a little about the upcoming action RPG at Capcom's showcase.

title: Every Starfield trait we've seen so far, from having parents to worshipping space serpents
description: Each trait adds a positive and negative attribute to your character. Here's what we know about them.
